titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1551) to authorize the Federal Aviation Administration's civil aviation research and development programs for fiscal years 2000 and 2001, and for other purposes.

action.text: Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 1551 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be read by section. Bill is open to amendments.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-318, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 110.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 290.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/14/1999--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 1551 (Federal Aviation Administration authorization).
